lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Helmut Schlesinger, vice-president of the West German central bank, the Bundesbank, said in Tokyo today that GNP, the widest measure of a country's economic activity, fell in real terms by a seasonally adjusted 1/2 to one pct in the first quarter compared with the fourth 1986 period.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: West German officials are likely to emphasise at the Venice summit that domestic demand, which draws in goods from abroad, is already outstripping export performance, which has suffered from an 80 pct rise of the mark against the dollar in just over two years.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: However, government officials have ruled out any further tax reduction packages to supplement a major program of stimulatory fiscal measures already underway.
